title: Drone Go2
description:
It is used for data reading and writing application operation of Holy Stone UAV RID equipment.
The app automatically scans the Bluetooth of the Holy Stone UAV RID device, and can perform driver ID binding on the device, device information writing, viewing, editing and other applications.
descriptionHTML:
It is used for data reading and writing application operation of Holy Stone UAV RID equipment.
The app automatically scans the Bluetooth of the Holy Stone UAV RID device, and can perform driver ID binding on the device, device information writing, viewing, editing and other applications.
